revision.text:
[[File:Coppice quadwing.png|thumb|A Coppice Quadwing]] '''Quadwings''' (Japanese: {{lang|ja|クロード}}, ''Kurōdo'') are an enemy family in the {{XC|serieslink}}. They are flying owl-like enemies with four wings (hence the name; ''quad'' being Latin for ''four'').
Quadwings come in three colour variations, separated by habitat.
== {{XC|-}} == In {{XC}}, Quadwings can be found in [[Satorl Marsh]], [[Makna Forest]], and [[Tephra Cave]], and their coloration varies with the area: blue and white in Satorl Marsh, brown and tan in Makna Forest, and grey and white in Tephra Cave. The strongest Quadwings are Rhoen Quadwings at level 92 in Tephra Cave.
=== Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Coppice Quadwing]] * [[Grove Quadwing]] * [[Jungle Quadwing]] * [[Rhoen Quadwing (XC1)|Rhoen Quadwing]]
=== Unique Monsters === * [[Elder Gragus]] * [[Stormy Widardun]]
== {{XCFC|sub}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Coppice Quadwing]] * [[Grove Quadwing]] * [[Jungle Quadwing]]
=== Unique Monster === * [[Confluent Uzva]]
== {{XC2|-}} == In {{XC2}}, Quadwings can be found in the [[Gormott Province]]. Daytime Quadwings are usually found perched, whereas nighttime Quadwings fly around.
=== Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Avys Quadwing]] * [[Huust Quadwing]] * [[Jang Quadwing]] * [[Night Avys Quadwing]] * [[Night Huust Quadwing]] * [[Night Ruga Quadwing]] * [[Ruga Quadwing (XC2)|Ruga Quadwing]]
=== Quest Exclusive Enemy === * [[Gegl Quadwing (XC2)|Gegl Quadwing]] (during ''[[Stolen Keepsake]]'')
=== Challenge Battle Mode Enemy === * [[Moordre Quadwing]]
== {{TTGC|-}} == In {{TTGC}}, only brown Quadwings can be found in the [[Kingdom of Torna]] and [[Gormott (TTGC)|Gormott]]. === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Bohn Quadwing]] * [[Highbohn Quadwing]] * [[Highscreeb Quadwing]] * [[Magra Quadwing]] * [[Nereus Quadwing]] * [[Night Magra Quadwing]] * [[Scribo Quadwing]]
=== Unique Monster === * [[Everdark Erg]]
== {{XC3|-}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Gegl Quadwing (XC3)|Gegl Quadwing]] * [[Nahtei Quadwing]] * [[Rhoen Quadwing (XC3)|Rhoen Quadwing]] * [[Ruga Quadwing (XC3)|Ruga Quadwing]] * [[Sotorig Quadwing]] * [[Wizda Quadwing]]
=== Quest Exclusive Enemies === * [[Alaat Quadwing]] (During ''[[Learning from Lambda]]'') * [[Hungry Quadwing]]
=== Unique Monster === * [[Profound Hodzuki]]
== {{XC3FR|sub}} == === Normal Minor Enemy === * [[Ruga Quadwing (XC3)|Ruga Quadwing]]
=== Quest Exclusive Bosses === * [[Strano Quadwing]] (During ''[[Takedown: Quadwings]]'')
== Gallery == === {{XC|-}} === <gallery> Grove Quadwing.jpg|A Quadwing from Satorl Marsh Jungle Quadwing.jpg|A Quadwing from Makna Forest Rhoen Quadwing.jpg|A Quadwing from Tephra Cave </gallery>
=== {{XC2|-}} === <gallery> GeglQuadwing.jpg NightHuustQuadwing.jpg RugaQuadwing.jpg </gallery>
=== {{TTGC|-}} === <gallery> EverdarkErg.jpg Magraquadwing.jpg </gallery>

'''Quarmus''' are a family of aquatic enemies in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. They are very similar to [[Quardun]]s.
== {{XC3|-}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Codon Quarmu]] * [[Dudan Quarmu]] * [[Lubon Quarmu]] * [[Mammon Quarmu]]
=== Unique Monsters === * [[Stately Doramma]]
== {{XC3FR|sub}} == === Normal Minor Enemy === * [[Codon Quarmu]]
{{clr}}
{{xc3 stub}}
[[Category:XC3 Species]] [[Category:XC3 Quarmus]] [[Category:XC3 Terrestrial Life]] [[Category:XC3FR Species]] [[Category:XC3FR Quarmus]] [[Category:XC3FR Terrestrial Life]] [[Category:Quarmus]] [[Category:Species by Type]]

{{for|the character|Queen of Keves}} {{spoiler}} {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Queen of Keves |image = XC3 Queen of Keves battle.PNG |caption = Queen of Keves |category = Boss |type = [[Keves Forces]] |level = 43 |area = [[Keves Castle]] ([[Throne Room (XC3)|Throne Room]]) |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = No |movement = Ground |detection = |exp = 3,080 |cp = 140 |sp = 0 |gold = 0 |hp = 1,135,350 |strength = 837 |healing = 279 |dexterity = 172 |agility = 135 |physdef = -10% |ethdef = 40% |critrate = 0% |guardrate = 0% }} The '''Queen of Keves''' is a [[Boss (XC3)|Boss]] in {{XC3}}. She is part of the [[Keves Forces]] and is fought at level 43 in the [[Throne Room (XC3)|Throne Room]] of [[Keves Castle]]. == Battle == === Resistances === {{XC3 Resistances |break = 65% |topple = 0% |daze = 0% |burst = 0% |launch = 0% |smash = 0% |blowdown = 75% |knockback = 75% |physdebuff = 50% |etherdebuff = Immune }} === Enraged === {|class="xc1 centered" style="width:55%;" !Trigger |Enemy is reduced to 50% HP. |- !Effects |Boosts Arts recharge speed by 100%. |} {{Clr}} === Arts === {|class="xc1 centered" style="width:150%;" !Name !Attribute !Targets !Hits !Power !Reactions/Statuses !Notes !Use Conditions |- |'''Auto-Attack''' |Ether |One Target |1 |100% | |style="text-align:left;"| *Accuracy is boosted by 50%. |Anytime |- |'''Elemental Wind''' |Ether |One Target |1 |330% | |style="text-align:left;"| *Accuracy is boosted by 50%. *Negates enemy guard; inflicts [[Break (XC3)|Break]] if guard is attempted. *Immune to [[Knockback (XC3)|Knockback]] and [[Blowdown (XC3)|Blowdown]] during Art. |Anytime |- |'''Elemental Earth''' |Ether |One Target |1 |220% |[[Toxin]] |style="text-align:left;"| *Accuracy is boosted by 50%. *Immune to Knockback and Blowdown during Art. *Damage from Toxin is boosted by 300%. |Anytime |- |'''Elemental Flare''' |Ether |Frontward AOE |3 |525% |[[Blaze (XC3)|Blaze]] |style="text-align:left;"| *Accuracy is boosted by 50%. *Immune to Knockback and Blowdown during Art. *Damage from Blaze is boosted by 100%. *Each hit can only damage a single target in range. |When reduced to 80% HP |- |rowspan="2"|'''Mind Blast''' |rowspan="2"|Ether |rowspan="2"|Frontward AOE |rowspan="2"|1 |220% |rowspan="2"|[[Shackle Arts]] |rowspan="2" style="text-align:left;"| *Accuracy is boosted by 100%. *Immune to Knockback and Blowdown during Art. |When reduced to between 25% and 50% HP |- |210% |When reduced to 25% HP |- |'''Ether Protection''' |Defense |Self | - | - | [[Invincible (XC3)|Invincible]] |style="text-align:left;"| *Battle in gameplay ends shortly after Art is used, transitioning into a cutscene. |When reduced to 1% HP |} === Notes === *The Queen of Keves's health cannot be completely depleted; at the first possible opportunity after meeting the use condition, she will cast Ether Protection. == Challenge Battle Mode == {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Queen of Keves |image = |caption = Queen of Keves |type = [[Keves Forces]] |movement = Ground |area = [[Land of Challenge (XC3)|Land of Challenge]] |category = [[Challenge Battle Enemy (XC3)|Challenge Battle Boss]] |level = 130 |detection = |spawntime = During ''[[Gauntlet: Pro]]'' |respawn = No |hp = 69,623,400 |strength = 11,591 |healing = 22,055 |dexterity = 688 |agility = 509 |physdef = -10% |ethdef = 40% |critrate = 0% |guardrate = 0% }} The Queen of Keves is fought at level 130 alongside [[Crys#Challenge Battle Mode|Consul Crys]] at Stage 120 of the [[Archsage's Gauntlet]] [[Challenge Battle Mode|Challenge]] ''[[Gauntlet: Pro]]''. === Skills === The Queen of Keves has the following skill: *Deals 10% less damage but takes 30% less damage. === Resistances === {{XC3 Resistances |break = 95% |blowdown = 75% |knockback = 75% |physdebuff = 90% |etherdebuff = Immune }} === Enraged === {|class="xc1 centered" style="width:55%;" !Trigger |Enemy is reduced to 50% HP. |- !Effects |style="text-align:left;"|Boosts damage dealt by 50%.
Boosts Arts recharge speed by 50%. |} === Arts === The Queen of Keves's Arts set in the Archsage's Gauntlet is a subset of those used in the story boss fight; she uses all Arts except for Ether Protection and the weaker version of Mind Blast. Additionally, her AI can use Elemental Wind, Elemental Earth and Elemental Flare at any time, while Mind Blast starts being used if any of the following conditions are met: *The Queen of Keves is enraged. *Consul Crys is defeated. *120 seconds elapse since the start of the stage. {{Clr}} == Quotes == === Boss === *''"Engulf all within your path!"'' *''"Flames, consume!"'' *''"You imperil this world."'' *''"I grant no reprieve."'' *''"Try all you like."'' *''"May the earth swallow you!"'' *''"This grieves me."'' *''"I had expected more from you."'' *''"How fruitless your endeavors."'' *''"I, Melia Antiqua, shall face you in mortal combat!"'' *''"It won't work."'' *''"O wind, rend them asunder."'' *''"My ether brims -- thus marking your imminent demise."'' *''"Victory is ours."'' *''"Ouroboros!"'' == Trivia == * Some of the attacks used by the Queen of Keves are [[Battle Arts (XC1)|arts]] used by Melia in {{XC}}. When the real Melia joins the party as a [[Hero]], she lacks some of these Arts, such as [[Mind Blast]] and [[Summon Wind|Wind]] Elemental; however, she also has Arts that her copy cannot use such as [[Starlight Kick (XC1)|Starlight Kick]] and the [[Summon Aqua|Aqua]] Elemental. == Gallery == === Artwork === Melia XC3 Sprite.png|Official Artwork of the Queen of Keves XC3 Melia Concept Art.png|Fake and Real Queen concept artwork === Screenshots === QOK Homecoming.PNG|The Queen of Keves at a Homecoming Ceremony {{xc3 stub}} {{XC3CharNav}} [[Category:XC3 Bosses]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Exclusive Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Enemies]] [[Category:Keves Castle Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 41-45 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Keves Forces]] [[Category:XC3 Level 100+ Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Challenge Battle Bosses]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing an infobox image]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]]

revision.text:
{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Rabejan Darbus |image = |caption = Rabejan Darbus |category = Minor Enemy |type = [[Darbus]] |level = 76 |area = [[Erythia Sea]] ([[Daedal Isle]]) |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = |detection = |exp = |cp = |sp = }} '''Rabejan Darbuses''' are Minor Enemies in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. They are members of the [[Darbus]] family, and can be found at level 76 on [[Daedal Isle]] in [[Erythia Sea]]. {{clr}} === Challenge Battle Mode === {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Rabejan Darbus |image = |caption = Rabejan Darbus |type = [[Darbus]] |movement = Ground |area = [[Land of Challenge (XC3)|Land of Challenge]] |category = [[Challenge Battle Enemy (XC3)|Challenge Battle]] [[Boss (XC3)|Boss]] |level = 40 |detection = |spawntime = During ''[[Gauntlet: Beginner]]'' |respawn = No |hp = 597,240 |strength = 721 |healing = 456 |dexterity = 159 |agility = 122 |physdef = 25% |ethdef = -5% |critrate = 30% |guardrate = 0% }} The '''Rabejan Darbus''' is a [[Challenge Battle Enemy (XC3)|Challenge Battle]] [[Boss (XC3)|Boss]] that is fought at level 40 at Stage 30 of the [[Archsage's Gauntlet]] [[Challenge Battle Mode|Challenge]] ''[[Gauntlet: Beginner]]''. ==== Skills ==== The Rabejan Darbus has the following skills: *Deals 10% less damage but takes 30% less damage. *Boosts Art recharge speed by 25%. ==== Resistances ==== {{XC3 Resistances |break = 70% |topple = 0% |daze = 0% |burst = 0% |launch = 0% |smash = 0% |knockback = 90% |blowdown = 90% |physdebuff = 70% |etherdebuff = 70% }} ==== Enraged ==== {|class="xc1 centered" style="width:55%;" !Trigger |Enemy is reduced to 50% HP. |- !Effects |style="text-align:left;"|Boosts damage dealt by 50%.
Boosts Art recharge speed by 50%. |} {{clr}} ==== Arts ==== {|class="xc1 centered" style="width:120%;" !Name !Attribute !Targets !Hits !Power !Reactions/Statuses !Notes |- |'''''Auto-Attack''''' |Physical |One Target |2 |250% | | |- |'''Compressive Shock''' |Physical |One Target |1 |400% |[[Shackle Blocking]] |style="text-align:left;"| *Accuracy is boosted by 100%. *Critical Rate is boosted by 50%. *Immune to [[Knockback (XC3)|Knockback]] and [[Blowdown (XC3)|Blowdown]] during Art. |- |'''Tail Flip''' |Physical |Frontward AOE |1 |200% |Blowdown |style="text-align:left;"| *Immune to Knockback and Blowdown during Art. |- |'''Howl of Rage''' |Buff |Self | - | - |[[Awakening (XC3)|Awakening]] |style="text-align:left;"| *Immune to Knockback and Blowdown during Art. |- |'''Gaia Crash''' |Physical |AOE around User |1 |225% |[[Topple (XC3)|Topple]] |style="text-align:left;"| *Accuracy is boosted by 50%. *Immune to all reactions during Art. |- |'''Brutal Cannon''' |Ether |Frontward AOE |1 |300% |[[Ether Defense Down (XC3)|Ether Defense Down]] |style="text-align:left;"| *Accuracy is boosted by 50%. *Immune to Knockback and Blowdown during Art. |} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Minor Enemies]] [[Category:XC3FR Minor Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Challenge Battle Bosses]] [[Category:Cadensia Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Darbuses]] [[Category:XC3FR Darbuses]] [[Category:XC3 Level 36-40 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 76-80 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3FR Level 51-55 Enemies]] [[Category:Aurora Shelf Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing an infobox image]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing an infobox image]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing drops]]
